original_title: An Exile in Paradise: the Adventures of Edward Lear in Greece and Albania. Part 1: Into Ottoman Lands
overview: Part 1 of a three-part documentary about Lear's 1848 epic journey through the awe-inspiring scenery of Greece and Albania followed by Robert Horne who encounters fascinating reminders of a turbulent past and the warmth of the modern inhabitants.
title: An Exile in Paradise: the Adventures of Edward Lear in Greece and Albania. Part 1: Into Ottoman Lands
